articles.title: Asian Games IND v CHN Live: Lakshya wins Match 1 to hand India early advantage - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India vs China men's badminton team final Live: Indian men's badminton team have qualified for the final for the first time ever in the history of Asian Games.
articles.content: Asian Games, India vs China men's badminton team finals Live Updates: Lakshya Sen hands India early advantage in the men's team badminton final against China at the Asian Games. Sen engages in a thre… [+15823 chars]
